Pre-Game Insights: Michael O’Neill is looking to build on Northern Ireland’s solid start in their UEFA Nations League campaign against Bulgaria.
The match is the second installment of their September double header in UNL League C Group 3.
O’Neill revealed the 2-0 win over Luxembourg has energised the team ahead of the game against Bulgaria.
Bulgaria has a youthful squad with limited international experience, particularly in goalkeeping.
Bulgarian captain Kiril Despodov is the most experienced player with 50 appearances, while others have fewer caps.
The match is Northern Ireland's fourth campaign in the Nations League, aiming to cement their top position in the group.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is set to be played in sweltering conditions in Plovdiv.
Bulgaria's last win came against Tanzania, and they finished bottom of their Euro 2024 qualifying group.
